entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
